body_html:
Then run below in the same folder to retrain. For more detail, you can see
Tensorflow for poets.

bazel-bin/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain
--bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks
--model_dir=/tf_files/inception
--output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb
--output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt
--image_dir /tf_files/flower_photos

On Tuesday, July 12, 2016, Xu Zhang xz70@duke.edu wrote:

Download it to any folder you wants and run

   cd /tensorflow/

bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain

On Tuesday, July 12, 2016, ank286 <notifications@github.com
javascript:_e(%7B%7D,'cvml','notifications@github.com');> wrote:

So you installed TensorFlow 0.9.0rc0 using sudo pip2 install
https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.9.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl

and you also compiled from source? Or you downloaded the source code for
0.9.0rc0 and put it in some folder, which folder?

Thank you

—
You are receiving this because you authored the thread.

body:
Then run below in the same folder to retrain. For more detail, you can see
Tensorflow for poets.

bazel-bin/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain \
--bottleneck_dir=/tf_files/bottlenecks \
--model_dir=/tf_files/inception \
--output_graph=/tf_files/retrained_graph.pb \
--output_labels=/tf_files/retrained_labels.txt \
--image_dir /tf_files/flower_photos

On Tuesday, July 12, 2016, Xu Zhang xz70@duke.edu wrote:

> Download it to any folder you wants and run
> 
> ```
>    cd /tensorflow/
> ```
> 
> bazel build -c opt --copt=-mavx tensorflow/examples/image_retraining:retrain
> 
> On Tuesday, July 12, 2016, ank286 <notifications@github.com
> <javascript:_e(%7B%7D,'cvml','notifications@github.com');>> wrote:
> 
> > So you installed TensorFlow 0.9.0rc0 using sudo pip2 install
> > https://storage.googleapis.com/tensorflow/linux/cpu/tensorflow-0.9.0rc0-cp27-none-linux_x86_64.whl
> > 
> > and you also compiled from source? Or you downloaded the source code for
> > 0.9.0rc0 and put it in some folder, which folder?
> > 
> > Thank you
> > 
> > —
